articles.description: Denny Hamlin wasn't the only driver who left Dover feeling good.
articles.content:
Here is a look at the winners and losers from Dover:
Winners
Denny Hamlin He got by Kyle Larson on a restart with 72 laps to go and then held off his friend to score his third win in the last seven… [+1654 chars]
